definition: Harbin, subprovincial city and capital of Heilongjiang province 黑龍江|黑龙江[Hei1 long2 jiang1] in northeast China

a Pekinese/a pug/(dialect) to scold
abbr. for 哈薩克斯坦|哈萨克斯坦[Ha1 sa4 ke4 si1 tan3], Kazakhstan/abbr. for 哈爾濱|哈尔滨[Ha1 er3 bin1], Harbin

shore/beach/coast/bank/to border on
Harbin, subprovincial city and capital of Heilongjiang province 黑龍江|黑龙江[Hei1 long2 jiang1] in northeast China
Harbin Institute of Technology
pinyin: Ha1 er3 bin1 Gong1 ye4 Da4 xue2

sentences.english: The multi-disciplinary university in China approved by the State Education Ministry, was founded in October, 2000.
sentences.chinese: 哈爾濱商業大學是我國第一所多科性商業大學。

sentences.english: Anyway, then I left Harbin and moved to Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 無論如何，後來我離開了哈爾濱，搬到了北京。

sentences.english: First Affiliated Hospital of Harbin Medical University, Department of Respiratory Medicine, deputy director of the Second Ward.
sentences.chinese: 哈爾濱醫科大學附屬第一醫院呼吸內科二病房副主任。

sentences.english: Heihe arrived it was cold, cold here than many of Harbin.
sentences.chinese: 剛到黑河感到很冷吧，這裏要比哈爾濱冷許多。

sentences.english: Harbin Euphony Musical Instrument Co. , Ltd.
sentences.chinese: 哈爾濱藝飛樂器材料有限公司。

sentences.english: Harbin Oil Factory is a state owned large scale grain food processing enterprise.
sentences.chinese: 哈爾濱油脂廠是國有大型糧油加工企業。

sentences.english: News Second, re-sold to harvester factory in Harbin.
sentences.chinese: 企業新聞二，本廠收割機再次銷售到哈爾濱。

sentences.english: The city of Harbin is a big city.
sentences.chinese: 哈爾濱市是一個大城市結束。

sentences.english: The experience of "traveling north" to Harbin made Fengzhi realize the absurdity of the existence of human beings.
sentences.chinese: 哈爾濱的“北遊”，使馮至認識到人類存在的荒誕性。

sentences.english: A woman slides down an ice slide at the Harbin International Ice and Snow Festival.
sentences.chinese: 在哈爾濱國際冰雪節上，一名女子從冰雕上滑下。

sentences.english: Our company has taken the lead in establishing Harbin Zhongda Research Institute for profiles doors and windows among the same industry.
sentences.chinese: 在同行業中率先成立了哈爾濱市中大塑料門窗研究所。

sentences.english: How can does Harbin find the wholesale retail Shu chest's?
sentences.chinese: 哈爾濱哪能找到批發零售束胸的啊？

sentences.english: Would you come to Harbin, my home town , some time this summer vacation?
sentences.chinese: 你會來哈爾濱，我的家鄉，這一段時間的暑假？

sentences.english: She graduated from the Chinese Department of Harbin Teachers University.
sentences.chinese: 畢業於哈爾濱師範大學中文系。

sentences.english: Design works of Ha'erbin Metro started in 2004.
sentences.chinese: 2004年開始進入哈爾濱地鐵設計工作。

sentences.english: Until 1896, Harbin was a fishing village on the banks of the Songhua River.
sentences.chinese: 直到1896年，哈爾濱只是一個松花江畔的漁村。
